paragraphs: This book was included in Fishing from the Creation Club

A single glassfish is needed for a potion that a client has requested. I cannot leave my shop unattended during the daylight hours, so I have no choice but to request that someone else acquire this fish for me.

Please see me at my establishment, Grave Concoctions, in Falkreath once you have the glassfish. A reward of 100 gold will be granted, plus an additional reward for any who might be willing to assume more work regarding a private matter.
